===========
filter_name
===========

.. js:attribute:: filter_name

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Filter class </refs/client/filter_api>`


Description
===========

Specifies the name of the filter as referenced in code.
Use **filter_name** to refer to the field in code.

See also
========

:doc:`Filters </programming/data/filters>`

:doc:`filter_caption <at_filter_caption>`

:doc:`Dataset </programming/data/dataset>`
